title: HelpMe@OS
description: Developed an interactive web-based application to assist users in navigating operating system concepts and troubleshooting common algorithms.

title: Type Master
description: Developed a clean and responsive web-based application to enhance typing skills by offering engaging practice sessions and real-time performance feedback.

title: Math Booster
description: Built a mobile math practice app to improve basic skills like add, subtract, multiply, and divide, with score tracking, attempt stats, and a clean, user-friendly Flutter interface.

title: Notes App
description: Built a cross-platform mobile app using Flutter to let users create, edit, and organize personal notes with a clean and responsive UI.

title: Number Game
description: Developed an interactive web-based number game with real-time score tracking, leaderboard competition, responsive design, intuitive interface, and comprehensive help section.

title: Loan Predictor
description: Built a Flutter-based mobile app that interacts with a Flask API to predict loan approval outcomes using machine learning on user-submitted data.

title: Heart Disease Prediction
description: Developed a heart disease prediction model using logistic regression, achieving 84.24% accuracy, highlighting predictive analytics' impact on healthcare.

title: Titanic Survival Prediction
description: Predicted Titanic passenger survival using machine learning: Logistic Regression, Decision Tree, SVM achieved accuracies up to 84.92%, identifying key survival factors.

title: Spam Detector
description: Developed a system to detect and filter spam messages using machine learning algorithms, classifying emails or texts as spam or non-spam (ham) accurately.

title: Adidas Sales EDA
description: This project analyzed Adidas sales data to find trends, segment customers, and explore sales factors, providing insights for strategic decisions.

title: Play Store EDA
description: Explored Google Play Store apps through Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA), revealing trends in categories, user ratings, reviews, app size versus installs, and app monetization.

title: To-Do App
description: A To-Do app where users can log in to manage tasks (create, update, delete), with tasks stored in a database. It ensures personalized task management for each user.

title: Shopping Mall Sales EDA
description: Conducted thorough data analysis on shopping mall sales, revealing insights into consumer behavior, product trends, and sales patterns.
